parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the heater core can cause coolant to leak into the passenger compartment, resulting in steam clouding the windshield and reducing visibility, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: Coolant escaping from the passenger compartment
fog or film on the windshield
greasy film build-up on the windshield

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the heater core bypass valve can cause coolant to leak into the passenger compartment, resulting in steam clouding the windshield and reducing visibility, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: Coolant escaping from the passenger compartment
fog or film on the windshield
greasy film build-up on the windshield

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Repair of Heater Core Issue
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Inadequate repair of the heater core issue can cause the problem to persist, leading to continued poor visibility and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Fog or film on the windshield
greasy film build-up on the windshield

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Chronic overheating can cause major repairs, engine damage, and potentially lead to a fire, posing a significant risk to vehicle safety and performance.
Failure of the oil pressure switch can cause engine damage, leading to costly repairs and potentially leaving the driver stranded.
A faulty oxygen sensor can cause the vehicle to stall, leading to a loss of control and potentially causing accidents.
A detached EGR hose can cause a fluttering noise and potentially lead to engine damage or stalling.
A faulty coolant temperature sensor can cause the engine to overheat, leading to damage and potentially causing a fire.
Alternator failure can cause the battery to drain, leading to unexpected stalls, loss of power, and increased risk of accidents, especially when driving at high speeds or in heavy traffic.
A short circuit in the battery harness can cause the vehicle to stall, leading to a loss of power and increased risk of accidents, especially when driving at high speeds or in heavy traffic.
symptoms: burning smell or smoke from the engine compartment

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: ECU failure can cause the vehicle to stall, leading to a loss of power and increased risk of accidents, especially when driving at high speeds or in heavy traffic.
symptoms: warning lights or error messages on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine compartment fires can cause significant damage to the vehicle and pose a risk to occupants and bystanders.
symptoms: Smoke or flames coming from the engine compartment
warning lights or error messages on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Lack of Parts for Recall Repairs
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of parts for recall repairs can delay or prevent the necessary repairs, leaving the vehicle in an unsafe condition and increasing the risk of injury or death in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The dealership or repair shop is unable to perform the recall repairs due to a lack of parts
the vehicle is left in an unsafe condition
the owner is unable to have the necessary repairs performed.
